item.title: Tutorial - Building an AWS Lambda in C#, part 6: Triggers
item.description: Let’s build an AWS Lambda in C# In part 5, we amended our Lambda to be able to write the results it found to an object in an S3 bucket.

item.title: Tutorial - Building an AWS Lambda in C#, part 5: S3
item.description: Let’s build an AWS Lambda in C# Congratulations on your progress!

item.title: Tutorial - Building an AWS Lambda in C#, part 4: Logs
item.description: Let’s build an AWS Lambda in C# In part 3, we extended our Lambda to communicate with an API, using a secret key.

item.title: Tutorial - Building an AWS Lambda in C#, part 2: Build, deploy and invoke
item.description: Let’s build an AWS Lambda in C# In part 1, we set up the basic infrastructure to support a new Lambda function on AWS.

item.title: Tutorial - Building an AWS Lambda in C#, part 1: AWS
item.description: Let’s build an AWS Lambda in C# At first glance, Amazon Web Services (AWS) can seem impenetrably complex.
